pageContent: Introduction: There are relatively few studies that compare the use of transrectal ultrasound (TRUS) to magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) to estimate the prostate volume. In this study, we compared the prostate volumes measured with MRI and TRUS with a surgical specimen volume.

metaData.source:
Outcomes and toxicities in patients treated with definitive focal therapy for primary prostate cancer: systematic review
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/27809594/
